title: First lesson - greetings, apologies etc.

preface: Hello guys. In this epizode of our course we would like to present the basics of Polish. Today we're going to learn greetings, excuses and basic words. We hope you'll enjoy this lesson a lot. So, let's get started üòâ

item1.content: At first, let's take a short look at what the Polish language actually is. As you may know, it's a western Slavic language, used by almost 70 million people all around the world, including almost 38 million citizens. As you can see, there are plenty of people who speak this language. And I am really glad you want to learn Polish too üòÅ. Many people who don't speak Polish are claiming it's the hardest language to learn. Even I, as a native Pole, get confused sometimes by my mother tongue. But don't worry - I'm going to do my best to transfer my knowledge to you as precisely as possible. Ok, enough with the theory, now let's start. At first, I'll show you some of our greetings.
